sentences.en: As a rule of thumb, a cup of filter coffee contains about 80mg of caffeine.
sentences.cn: 凭经验估计，一杯过滤咖啡约含80毫克咖啡因。

sentences.en: He often works by rule of thumb.
He pinched the leaf between his thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他将叶子捏在拇指和食指之间.

sentences.en: He took the pen between his thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他用拇指和食指捏着笔。

sentences.en: I press the thumbtack into the board with thumb.
sentences.cn: 我用大拇指将图钉按在木板上.

sentences.en: I thumbed a lift into town.
John nipped his thumb in the door!
sentences.cn: 约翰的拇指被门夹住了!

sentences.en: Miss Finkelstein will put a dressing on your thumb.
sentences.cn: 芬克尔斯坦小姐会为你包扎拇指的。

sentences.en: plans to build a house on the site have been given the thumbs down by the Department of the Environment.
sentences.cn: 环境部反对在这个地方建房的计划。

sentences.en: She bit the tip of her left thumb, not looking at me.
sentences.cn: 她咬着左手的拇指尖，眼睛也不看我。

sentences.en: She had a painful cut on her thumb.
sentences.cn: 她的拇指上有个疼痛的伤口.

sentences.en: She has Rachel firmly under her thumb.
sentences.cn: 她把雷切尔牢牢地抓在手心里。

sentences.en: She held the coin carefully between finger and thumb.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地把那枚硬币捏在食指和拇指之间。

sentences.en: She still sucks her thumb when she's worried.
sentences.cn: 她在忧虑时仍然会吸吮大拇指。

sentences.en: Surgeons at Odstock Hospital, Wilts, sewed the thumb on.
sentences.cn: 威尔特郡奥德斯多克医院的外科医生将大拇指缝合上了。

sentences.en: The boy sucked his thumb and stared at Hebburn with huge, round eyes.
sentences.cn: 男孩吮吸着拇指，瞪圆了大眼睛盯着赫本。

sentences.en: There is a hole in the thumb of his mitten.
sentences.cn: 他的手套的拇指上有个洞.

sentences.en: This glove has a hole in the thumb.
sentences.cn: 这只手套的大拇指处有个洞.

words.tran_cn: 翻阅；以拇指拨弄；作搭车手势；笨拙地摆弄

phrases.tran_cn: 笨拙的：缺少身体上的协调、技能或风度的；笨拙的
同be all fingers and thumbs （见finger）
作蔑视的手势：把或似把拇指放在鼻子上并摆动其它手指以表示批评或嘲弄
指状储存器；拇指驱动器
反对：否决、拒绝或反对的表示
刮刮叫：赞同、成功或希望的表示
(非正式)赞同；赞赏，满意（或否定、排斥、反对、拒绝、抛弃）
n. 大拇指汤姆（英民间故事中只有拇指大的主人公）
处于某人的控制下；受制于
在某人的支配（或控制）下，在某人的巨大影响之下

trans.tran_en: the part of your hand that is shaped like a thick short finger and helps you to hold things
to persuade a driver of a passing car to stop and take you somewhere, by putting your hand out with your thumb raised

trans.tran_cn: 翘起拇指请求搭乘（过路汽车），示意请求搭便车，翻阅
翻阅，作搭车手势，用拇指翻脏[翻坏]（书页等）
